mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rate_id AS "rateId", a.bank_rate_id AS "bankRateId", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.business_type AS "businessType", a.product_code AS "productCode", a.product_name AS "productName", a.rule_begin_time AS "ruleBeginTime", a.rule_end_time AS "ruleEndTime", a.charge_source AS "chargeSource", a.charge_deduct_type AS "chargeDeductType", a.charge_collection_type AS "chargeCollectionType", a.is_refundable AS "isRefundable", a.status AS "status", a.settle_type AS "settleType", a.settlement_to AS "settlementTo", a.notify_url AS "notifyUrl", a.back_url AS "backUrl", a.ip_domain AS "ipDomain", a.autograph_key AS "autographKey", a.autograph_type AS "autographType", a.bank_no AS "bankNo", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_card_type AS "bankCardType", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.charge_ratio AS "chargeRatio", a.charge_fee AS "chargeFee", a.max_fee AS "maxFee", a.min_fee AS "minFee", a.operation_time AS "operationTime", a.operation_user AS "operationUser", a.operation_type AS "operationType"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO merchant_rate_log( id, rate_id, bank_rate_id, merchant_id, business_type, product_code, product_name, rule_begin_time, rule_end_time, charge_source, charge_deduct_type, charge_collection_type, is_refundable, status, settle_type, settlement_to, notify_url, back_url, ip_domain, autograph_key, autograph_type, bank_no, bank_name, bank_card_type, charge_type, charge_ratio, charge_fee, max_fee, min_fee, operation_time, operation_user, operation_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rateId}, #{bankRateId}, #{merchantId}, #{businessType}, #{productCode}, #{productName}, #{ruleBeginTime}, #{ruleEndTime}, #{chargeSource}, #{chargeDeductType}, #{chargeCollectionType}, #{isRefundable}, #{status}, #{settleType}, #{settlementTo}, #{notifyUrl}, #{backUrl}, #{ipDomain}, #{autographKey}, #{autographType}, #{bankNo}, #{bankName}, #{bankCardType}, #{chargeType}, #{chargeRatio}, #{chargeFee}, #{maxFee}, #{minFee}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{operationType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE merchant_rate_log SET rate_id = #{rateId}, bank_rate_id = #{bankRateId}, merchant_id = #{merchantId}, business_type = #{businessType}, product_code = #{productCode}, product_name = #{productName}, rule_begin_time = #{ruleBeginTime}, rule_end_time = #{ruleEndTime}, charge_source = #{chargeSource}, charge_deduct_type = #{chargeDeductType}, charge_collection_type = #{chargeCollectionType}, is_refundable = #{isRefundable}, status = #{status}, settle_type = #{settleType}, settlement_to = #{settlementTo}, notify_url = #{notifyUrl}, back_url = #{backUrl}, ip_domain = #{ipDomain}, autograph_key = #{autographKey}, autograph_type = #{autographType}, bank_no = #{bankNo}, bank_name = #{bankName}, bank_card_type = #{bankCardType}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, charge_ratio = #{chargeRatio}, charge_fee = #{chargeFee}, max_fee = #{maxFee}, min_fee = #{minFee}, operation_time = #{operationTime}, operation_user = #{operationUser}, operation_type = #{operationType} WHERE id = #{id}
